alert.note: Alert for Chatanika River Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 7:00PM AKST until January 30 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and cold wind chills. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Wind chills will get as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Chatanika River Valley. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility. Snow drifts may form. Wind gusts to 25 mph will result in wind chills to 50 below zero and could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates between 0.5 to 1 inch per hour at times tonight northeast of Chatanika. Highest snowfall amounts will be northeast of Chatanika along the Steese Highway. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&
